meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6079.

td.p: Marty Christy, a language arts middle school teacher from Alexandria, Virginia
Mai Do-Burrous, a stay-at-home mother from New York, New York
Fred Cofone, a copy editor from Old Greenwich, Connecticut (whose 1-day cash winnings total $3,200)

tr.td: BRITISH NOVELISTS
UP ON MOUNT RUSHMORE
GENESIS QUOTE FILL-IN
UNUSUAL COUNTRY MUSIC LYRICS
4-SYLLABLE WORDS

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
